en.title: What is the contact number of the applicant?
en.line1: This can be the number of a trusted friend if the applicant does not have a private number.

cy.title: What is the contact number of the applicant? (Welsh)
cy.line1: Gall hwn fod yn rhif ffôn ffrind maen nhw’n ymddiried ynddynt os nad oes gan y ceisydd rif ffôn preifat

applicantPhoneNumber.atleastOneRequired: Phone number is empty, please fill up at least one contact
Phone number is empty, please fill up at least one contact (Welsh)
